description: Rear-wheel drive sedan of the E class. The official premiere of the third generation of the model took place at the LA Auto Show in December 2017.
overview: The design solutions are in line with the concept of hot and cool, emotion and intelligence, which was first tested in the series on the third generation CLS. The car is distinguished by a forward-tilted radiator grille and headlights that go into the profile, but at the same time its design does not seem aggressive. This is facilitated by the absence of sharp lines on the front bumper - the shapes are dynamic, but smoothed out. The stern of the car looks less heavy compared to the previous generation due to a significant reduction in headlights and their division into two sections. The interior, on the other hand, is a solution familiar to us from other Mercedes-Benz models, brought together: a solid panel of two 12.3-inch screens and four deflectors under them have already been tested on the E- and S-classes. The turbine-shaped baffles are the solution for the E-Class Coup√© and Convertible.

specifications.name: Engine capacity(l):
specifications.hint: Engine capacity refers to the volume swept by all the pistons of an engine, within their bores, from the top to the bottom of their travel.

specifications.name: Horse power(hp):
specifications.hint: Horsepower (hp) is a unit of measurement of power, or the rate at which work is done, usually in reference to the output of engines or motors.

specifications.name: Torque(Nm):
specifications.hint: Torque is a twisting force that speaks to the engine's rotational force and measures how much of that twisting force is available when an engine exerts itself.
